thread.title: The Wall Street Journal: West Virginia teachers’ strike continues over doubts legislature will OK dea

title: The Wall Street Journal: West Virginia teachers’ strike continues over doubts legislature will OK dea
text:
A weeklong teacher strike across West Virginia continued on Thursday, despite a tentative deal reached Tuesday with the state’s governor, and union officials said it was unclear if classes would resume Friday.
Gov. Jim Justice had proposed granting teachers a 5% pay increase this year after raising revenue forecasts and forming a task force to address rising costs at the statewide Public Employees Insurance Agency. Union officials accepted the terms and said teachers represented by two major unions would return to schools on... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
